"Autowords":
"\"Autowords\" are a system that lets you pre-register phrases for your character to automatically say in certain situations, such as when you level up.

To register a set of Autowords, select \"Chat\" from the main menu, then select \"Autoword Settings\"."

"If you register multiple phrases for the same situation, one will be selected randomly when that condition is met.

You can register up to 3 phrases for each situation.
"
